reviewText: It's a good copy not bootlegged that we're used to.  I could've ordered a more hardcore porn but I like playboy playmates.  I'm really not good at these things plus it's really early in the morning so I'll just catch some more sleep.

This playmate video while nice is lacking in some areas.  what i don't get about these playmate videos is that they give the lesser looking playmates the hotter segments while the hotter playmates get lame segments. take jamie westenhiser who is smoking hot.  both of her sets while alright(just b/c she is so hot) are lacking.  in the first part of jamies set, shes on a beach and deosnt even get naked.  u only  get  quick glimpes of her naked body and barely get to check out her rearend.  jamies next segment starts out alright with her stripping out of her suit dress but this extremely hot introduction is cut short so jamie can bathe.  yeah she looks good bathing, but i wanted to see more of her buns walking around in garters.  same type of stuff with destiny's segment.  why cant playboy get a better director?  this video is nice because the girls are hot, but a lot of the segments could be done better.

The DVD "Playmate VIDEO CALENDAR 2006" compared with previous Playboy's Video Calendars, seems a little poor: menu without music, lack of bonus material and the segments of Colleen Shannon and Tiffany Fallon already featured in previous DVDs.

However some scenes with Scarlett Keegan and Kara Monaco are very beautiful and artistic like a painting.
A great dvd to add to your collection!

I really liked the playmate of the year in this video, as well as a few others, but there were a couple of others who didn't fit my standards of feminine beauty.  Totally subjective, but there it is.
OT
What can you say. It is a "Collection" after all. Love it or leave it alone!
This is a must buy for men who like Smokin hot women after watching your wish you had ordered more tissue paper and more Playboy DVDs. A must buy then.

Playboy: Playmate DVD Calendar Collection 2000-2005 is 8 hours and 36 minutes long and was released on DVD on February 14, 2006. The average run time for each year is one hour and twenty-six minutes. Starting in 2000 almost an extra half hour of footage is added where as during the 1980s and 1990s your average calendar video run time was 55 minutes. 2002 year marks the last year that announcer Neil Ross hosts the video Playmate Calendars. Starting in 2003 James Horan takes over and in 2004 and 2005 the announcer is Lex Lang. For 2000 and 2001 the Playmates look natural and it is in 2002 that the Playmates start looking like they took and bike pump to their breasts and just went crazy. The good news it looks like the other half just went with their natural beauty. The only reason that I bought this DVD was because I own the VHS 2001 Playmate Video Calendar and did not want to spend the seventy dollars for the DVD version listed on Amazon. Some other complaints about this DVD are that there are no bonus features like the Playboy: Playmate DVD Calendar Collection - The 90's had. In the VHS 2001 Playmate Video Calendar Zebrahead's uncensored Playmate of the Year video is included. Also Playboy could have waited till the decade was completed to put out a ten year video calendar. The worst year in this collection is the last year-2005. The most of the Playmates are conservative about their nudity. My advice to you all out there reading this is if a friend own this collection then go over there and watch and make up your own mind to buy it or not. I have included a list of all the Playmates during the odd years below. Playboy: Playmate DVD Calendar Collection 2000-2005 gets a B-.

In the 90's we had the best girls: Jenny, Karen, Victoria, Lisa, etc...

This collection starts from 2000 and the girls stills Playboy style, very cute!

But during that " era " videos were kind of softcore, always with very good tastes.

2002 is the best year.

It's a pitty that Playboy stops that productions.

As usual the selection of girls tends to make or break it for me.  No real stars for me this year but solid enough with one real dud.

Jillian Grace - cute, nicely rounded girl with good clips.
Scarlett Keegan - freckly, very pale with curly red hair - doesn't do much for me.
Kimberly Holland - cute enough.
Amber Campisi - cute bruenette w/nice natural looking breasts.
Kara Monaco - cute girl, cute 1st clip, 2nd one is kinda boring.
Qiana Chase - Hate the hair.  Does NOTHING for me.
Jamie Westenhiser - Very hot bruenette except her boobs have too much separation between them.  Looks like a good/bad boob job to me.
Colleen Shannon - good if you want to see a naked girl riding a mechanical bull.  Her face or facial expressions put me off.  Trying too hard to be sexy (?) came off really fake.
Cara Zavaleta - A nice natural bruenette w/ a nice "normal" body.  I enjoyed her clips without knowing her from Road Rules.
Destiny Davis - cute girl with overstuffed boobs.
Courtney Culken - Very cute, prob my favorite girl on the dvd at a b/b+?
Tiffany Fallon - Her 1st clip is the best on the dvd.  I just love her nipples & the sexy outfits that keep the good stuff uncovered.  2nd clip is kinda boring.

Besides the obvious--this collection covers only six years instead of 13--this release falls short of Playboy: Playmate DVD Calendar Collection - The 90's in the quality of the models presented. Too many plastic-looking chicks with plastic-looking (parts). But it's still a good collection with lots of content and lots of attractive women, and in this era they showed more which is always good. Must own for big Playboy fans.
I have some of the playmates calendar videos on VHS tapes, now I finally have the whole collection on DVDs. Awesome.
